prompt:

responses.gpt4: I'm glad to hear that, Ms. Cruz. We just performed a simple CHF assessment. Doing this at home every day can help identify any changes in your condition early on. I understand that keeping track of symptoms can sometimes be challenging. Do you have any questions about how to keep track of these symptoms?
responses.our_model: That's good to hear, Ms. Cruz. We just performed a simple CHF assessment. It's a good idea to do this at home every day. I understand that keeping track of symptoms can be complicated. Do you have any questions about how to do so?
